1_1DBjD2Xf1DymmjxEi5K7aeoaRByAAXBvFW.body: Upvotes and downvotes are just data.  If ZeroTalk were a merged-type site, someone could extend the display so that users could make use of this data in a way that they find beneficial.  For example, it could be set up so that a user could ignore all votes outside of a circle of other users that they designate.  I don't care about posts that are popular with the whole community, but I do care about posts that are popular with people I find interesting.

1_1MxinCGP4R54Rxxmig41K132aGrUJgwq4A.body: In many cases the scraping may be the difficult part.  Has anyone reached out to popular sites to ask them if they would be interested in having a mirror on ZeroNet?
